alert.note: Alert for Clark (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:13PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Clark County through 745 PM CDT... At 713 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Fairchild, or 11 miles northwest of Neillsville, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Clark County, including the following locations... Wildcat Mound, Snyder Lake, The Highground, Tioga, Highway 10 And Bald Peak Road and Sidney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
